definition: surrounding like a crown (especially of the blood vessels surrounding the heart), obstruction of blood flow in a coronary artery by a blood clot (thrombus)
details:
adjective
- surrounding like a crown (especially of the blood vessels surrounding the heart)
= example: surrounding like a crown (especially of the blood vessels surrounding the heart)
noun
- obstruction of blood flow in a coronary artery by a blood clot (thrombus)
= synonyms: coronary thrombosis
